issue.title: [R] add group_vars.RecordBatchReader method
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14348](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14348). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11032/commits/fbe6e884fa3457e9d20e93137688b85346fa86df 

Added a hack to get around lack of this method. Instead we should add a method that returns `NULL`
